text: kondeth awul wela...
tharuwaka aruna granthaya palamu weluma 2018.08. 28 dinaye kolambaa mahawali kendrayedi eli dakwima.
ee ape minissunge kuhaka kamaya..
dan eya issarahata yanawa.

mak nisada yath wibhagayak athayi kiyuwath pothak padam kirimata awadi wi nositina, nibandhana kirimata kotharam kalaya nathath ra 10.30 pahu weddi nindata yana, mage aadaraniya mahaththaya eeye ra 10.30 pahu wenawath samagama (dubayi welawen) fut bol mach eka balannata sadi pahadi sitimayi.
ee athara paudgalika bas rathawala dhawakayo da sitithi.

ithin eda doktar lanch eka aragaththa gamanma thamayi mu kamareta gihilla thiyenne.

ihalagama pradeshaye sita daraluwa dumriya sthanayata gaman kirimata athi kalupalama pradeshaye widuliya nomathi bawin rathri kalayedi dumriya sthanayata gaman kirimedi wishala apahasuthawayanata pathwana bawa ema margaya pawichchi karanno pawasathi.aththanagalu oya mathin idikara athi me palamen rathri kalayedi gamangath wishala pirisak me wana wita wiwidha anathuru walata muhuna di athi bawa penwa dena pradeshawasihu me sthanayata widuli pahan paddhathiyak labadimata katayuthu karana lesa adala baladharingen illa sitithi..

ema tharunaya riya anathurakata muhuna dunneya.
jaala thihariya paththata ho kuliyapitiya paththata genichcha kiyala thamayi hoduwawak thiyenne.

thribuwan jathyanthara guwan thotupale wishesha amuththan piliganime paryanthaya wetha pamini janadhipathiwaraya athulu dutha pirisa ehidi unusum andamin piliganna ladde erata niyojya agramathya saha widesha amathi sujatha koyirala samuhandu, parlimenthu katayuthu saha sanskruthika amathya aacharya minendra rijal yana mahathwarun wisini.

gana samagama sahathika sangamaya»rusiyanu liyapadinchi» sahathika sangamaya»rusiyanu liyapadinchi»sapayana sewa sahathikaya ha wisheshagnya agayima, ha salaka wishalathama ha jathyantharawa piligath rusiyanu sahathikaya ha widwath sanwidhanayaki nama»rusiyanu liyapadinchi»aithihasikawa adala anukulatha thakseru samajaya wargikaranaya sandaha, muhudu ganga ha wila yathra»rusiyanu liyapadinchi»wisin sthapitha karana ladi, pradhana pele rakshana samithi rusiyanu adhirajyaya sandaha thakshanika manum sanwardhanaya yana.»rusiyanu liyapadinchi»aarambha kara atha, ehi katayuthu pilibanda sahathika kirima saha anukulatha thakseru thula ramuwa rusiyanu nawika liyapadinchi naw.

mema ratawal thula, 20 wana siyawase darunuma damarikayange anupa්rapthika, antha dakshinanshika saha fasistwadi sanwidhanawala ihala yamak daka gatha haka. 1930 ha 1940 gananwala menma jathikawadi wisha kawima magin kamkaruwan ekinekata erehiwa pihituwime pa්rayathnaya, samaja subhasadhana wadapiliwel kapima, samaja asamanathawaye imahath wardhanaya, pa්rajathantha්rawadi ayithin winasha kirima saha siyallatath wada, loka yuddhaye dhawanaya samaga ath wal bandaganiyi.
mage langin oya nidi hitha kothanada mama hitiye ee gawa
samyak drushtiya athi ayekwa mithyadrushtikayaku kirima tharam wishala akusal siduwana kriyawak thawath naha.
